name: Fallen (itch) (alexjgriffith)
description:
Our hero must collect the gears spread throughout the floating islands and face Robo Satan in the depths of hell. Jump and stab your way to victory, slaying all of our cute friends along the way.

This is a submission for the spring 2019 Lisp Game Jam.

The Making Of

The source can be found at https://gitlab.com/alexjgriffith/fallen

The game is written in fennel using Love2d, and it turned into a beast over the past 10 days. What started as a short 700LOC project somehow sprawled into 2700 LOC over the last 3 days.

All pixel art that made it into the game was made by me over the past 10 days. Thought it would be a good challenge, and it was! I've been using https://www.aseprite.org/

The music is by Scott Scott Barkley, with a CC-BY licence. https://soundcloud.com/scottbuckley

Controls

Move left and right A and D, jump using W and swing your spear using SPACE
